title: Real Estate Listing Description Generator
description: Create captivating property descriptions that sell homes faster
prompt:
Write a luxury real estate listing description.

Property Details:
- Type: [House/Condo/Estate]
- Bedrooms/Bathrooms: [NUMBER]
- Key Features: [LIST FEATURES, e.g., pool, chef's kitchen, view]
- Location: [NEIGHBORHOOD/CITY]
- Vibe: [Modern/Cozy/Historic]

Structure:
1. Catchy Headline
2. Opening Hook (Lifestyle focus)
3. Feature Highlights (Sensory details)
4. Location Benefits
5. Call to Action (Schedule viewing)

title: Cold Call Script for Expired Listings
description: Empathetic scripts to win back frustrated sellers
prompt:
Write a cold call script for an expired listing.

Agent Name: [NAME]
Homeowner Situation: [Listed for 6 months, didn't sell]
Goal: [Get an appointment]

Approach:
- Be empathetic, not pushy
- Ask a pattern-interrupt question
- Offer a specific value add (e.g., "I have a new marketing plan")
- Handle objection: "I'm taking it off the market"

title: Virtual Tour Script Writer
prompt:
Write a script for a 60-second video tour of this property.

Room flow: [Entry -> Living Room -> Kitchen -> Backyard -> Master Suite]
Key Selling Point: [The View/The Kitchen]

Tone: [Energetic/Relaxed/Luxury]

Include:
- Intro hook
- Transition phrases between rooms
- Call out specific details (e.g., "Notice the crown molding")
- Closing CTA

title: Lead Qualification Chatbot Persona
description: Train AI to qualify buyer leads 24/7
prompt:
Act as a friendly Real Estate Assistant named [NAME].

Your goal: Qualify buyer leads.

Ask these questions naturally in conversation:
1. What is your timeline to move?
2. Have you been pre-approved for a mortgage?
3. What is your price range?
4. Are you working with another agent?

If they are unrepresented and pre-approved, try to book a call with [AGENT NAME].

title: Neighborhood Guide Generator
description: Establish local authority with detailed area guides
prompt:
Write a comprehensive guide to [NEIGHBORHOOD].

Target Audience: [Families/Young Professionals]

Cover:
1. Overview/Vibe
2. Real Estate Market Stats (General trends)
3. Top Schools
4. Best Coffee Shops & Restaurants
5. Parks & Recreation
6. Commute/Transportation
7. Why people love living here

title: Open House Follow-up Email Sequence
description: Convert open house visitors into clients
prompt:
Write a 3-email sequence for open house visitors.

Context: They visited [ADDRESS] on Sunday.

Email 1 (Sunday evening): Thank you, digital brochure link, ask for feedback.
Email 2 (Tuesday): Similar properties in the area, offer a private tour.
Email 3 (Friday): Market update for the neighborhood, offer a coffee chat.

Tone: Helpful, low pressure.

title: Real Estate Investor Pitch Deck
prompt:
Create an outline for a Real Estate Investment pitch deck.

Property: [ADDRESS/TYPE]
Strategy: [Fix & Flip/Buy & Hold]

Slides:
1. Executive Summary
2. The Property (Current condition)
3. The Market (Comps & Trends)
4. The Plan (Renovation scope & budget)
5. Financials (ROI, Cap Rate, Cash on Cash)
6. Exit Strategy
7. The Team

title: Social Media Content Calendar for Agents
description: 30 days of post ideas to grow your brand
prompt:
Create a 4-week social media calendar for a Realtor.

Focus: [Luxury Homes/First Time Buyers]

Mix:
- Listings (20%)
- Educational (40%)
- Personal/Behind the Scenes (20%)
- Local Community (20%)

Provide post topic, format (Reel/Carousel/Image), and caption hook for each day.
